content: skill level beginner/easy needle us 8 5mm a smaller needle - us 7 4 5mm or us 6 4mm - can be used for a tighter gauge yarn recommendation fingering weight yarn sport weight or dk weight yarn can be used for a tighter gauge yarn amount 9 g = 34 m / 37 yd gauge 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 in x 4 in = 25 stitches x 24 row approximate measurements 70 cm x 3 6 cm / 27 5 in x 1 4 in 3 6 cm 70 cm this is a great project to do if you have leftover scrap yarn i personally like the length and width that are written in the pattern because i believe it ties nicely around the head as a headband and a ponytail as a hair tie however feel free to make it whatever length you like you can change the width by casting on more stitches *** alteration instructions on final page abbreviations/terminology k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 together measured from point -
